fields.headline: Newcastle v Southampton: match preview
fields.bodyText: Southampton arrive on Tyneside bolstered by the collection of seven points in their past three games but Newcastle are buoyed by their haul of four from two tricky looking fixtures against Manchester City and Sheffield United. By making the most of sometimes startlingly low possession, Steve Bruce is not only beginning to win a few initially flinty hearts and minds at St James’ Park but seems to be bringing the best out of Jonjo Shelvey as he attempts to make the 3-4-3 template he inherited from Rafael Benítez a little more attacking while retaining its defensive meanness.
